sql.statement:
WITH daily_mileage_by_department AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE(t.track_start_time) AS track_date,
        COALESCE(d.department_label, 'Unknown') AS department_label,
        SUM(t.track_distance_meters) / 1000.0 AS distance_km
    FROM business_data.tracks t 
    LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.objects o ON t.device_id = o.device_id
    LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
        SELECT dh.new_employee_id, dh.changed_datetime AS start_time
        FROM raw_business_data.driver_history dh
        WHERE dh.object_id = o.object_id
            AND dh.changed_datetime <= t.track_start_time
        ORDER BY dh.changed_datetime DESC
        LIMIT 1
    ) di ON true
    LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.employees e ON di.new_employee_id = e.employee_id
    LEFT JOIN raw_business_data.departments d ON d.department_id = e.department_id
    WHERE t.track_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month'
        AND t.track_start_time < CURRENT_DATE
    GROUP BY DATE(t.track_start_time), d.department_label
)
SELECT 
    track_date AS timestamp,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN department_label = 'Drivers' THEN distance_km ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "Drivers",
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN department_label = 'Logistics' THEN distance_km ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "Logistics",
--    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN department_label = 'Delivery' THEN distance_km ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "Delivery",
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN department_label = 'Sales' THEN distance_km ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "Sales"
FROM daily_mileage_by_department
GROUP BY track_date
ORDER BY track_date;

SELECT 
    ROUND(SUM(t.track_distance_meters) / 1000.0, 0) AS value
FROM business_data.tracks t 
WHERE t.track_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month'
    AND t.track_start_time < CURRENT_DATE;

WITH time_classified_tracks AS (
    SELECT 
        t.track_distance_meters,
        DATE_TRUNC('week', t.track_start_time)::DATE AS week_start_date,
        -- Time classification with standard parameters
        CASE 
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM t.track_start_time) IN (0, 6) THEN 'weekend'
            -- Work hours: 9:00-18:00
            WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t.track_start_time) BETWEEN 9 AND 17 THEN 'work_time'
            -- Non-work time: all other time on weekdays
            ELSE 'non_work_time'
        END AS time_category
    FROM business_data.tracks t 
    WHERE t.track_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month'
        AND t.track_start_time < CURRENT_DATE
)
SELECT 
    week_start_date AS category,
    ROUND(SUM(track_distance_meters) / 1000.0, 0) AS value,
    time_category AS series
FROM time_classified_tracks
GROUP BY week_start_date, time_category
ORDER BY week_start_date, time_category;

WITH vehicle_mileage AS (
    SELECT 
        t.device_id,
        SUM(t.track_distance_meters) / 1000.0 AS total_km
    FROM business_data.tracks t 
    WHERE t.track_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month'
        AND t.track_start_time < CURRENT_DATE
    GROUP BY t.device_id
)
SELECT 
    ROUND(AVG(total_km), 0) AS value
FROM vehicle_mileage;

WITH time_classified_tracks AS (
    SELECT 
        t.track_distance_meters,
        -- Time classification with standard parameters
        CASE 
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM t.track_start_time) IN (0, 6) THEN 'weekend'
            -- Work hours: 9:00-18:00
            WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t.track_start_time) BETWEEN 9 AND 17 THEN 'work_time'
            -- Non-work time: all other time on weekdays
            ELSE 'non_work_time'
        END AS time_category
    FROM business_data.tracks t 
    WHERE t.track_start_time >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 month'
        AND t.track_start_time < CURRENT_DATE
)
SELECT 
    time_category AS category,
    round(SUM(track_distance_meters) / 1000.0, 0) AS value
FROM time_classified_tracks
GROUP BY time_category
ORDER BY time_category;
